黦黦黦

黦字的基本解释

黦
yuè
黄黑色。
东西打湿后出现黄黑色斑纹：“空使泪染桃花双袖黦。”

黦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》於月切，入月，影。］
［《廣韻》紆物切，入物，影。］
“宛5”的被通假字。
(1)出现污迹，玷污。
(2)黄黑色。
[②]［yè］
［《廣韻》於歇切，入月，影。］
色泽变坏。

黦字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黦； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1520第31
【唐韻】紆物切【集韻】紆勿切，?音鬱。【說文】本作?。黑有文也。【廣韻】黃黑色也。【廣雅】黑也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於月切，音?。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於歇切，音謁。【廣韻】色壞也。【集韻】色變也。【周處風土記】梅雨霑衣服皆敗黦。【韋莊詞】淚霑紅袖黦。

黦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
黦字的起名意思

暂无。

Luan
Basic explanation of words
Luan
yuè
Yellow-black.
Yellow-black markings appeared when things got wet: "Sora makes tears stain the peach blossom double sleeves."
Luan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guangyun" cuts in the moon, enters the moon, and shadows. ]
["Guangyun" cuts into objects, enters objects, and shadows. ]
"Wan 5" was passed falsely.
(1) Smudges and stains appear.
(2) Yellow and black.
[②]［yè］
["Guangyun" cuts at rest, enters the moon, and shadows. ]
The color has deteriorated.
Luan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Black Word Department] 　黦; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1520 31
[Tang Yun] Cut things out [Ji Yun] Don’t cut things, the sound is gloomy. [Said the text] This work?. Hei has text. [Guang Yun] Yellow and black. [Guang Ya] Hei Ye.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yuyue cut, sound?. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Xieqie, the sound is heard. [Guang Yun] The color is bad. [Jiyun] The color has changed. [Zhou Chu Feng Tu Ji] Mei Yu is stained with clothes all defeated. [Wei Zhuang Ci] Tears are stained with red sleeves.

yè, yù
гл. линять, выцветать (напр. о материи); желтеть, блекнуть (напр. о красках): полинялый, пожелтелый
